Post.title: dockerHexo
Post._content:
# 1. 
## 
- **Ubuntu**
- **www.xwxstudio.com**

## Node.js
### [NodeSource](https://github.com/nodesource/distributions#debinstall)

``` bash
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
```
## Hexo
### npm

``` bash
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.1/install.sh | bash
```
### NodeHexo

``` bash
npm install hexo-cli -g
#
hexo init .
npm install
#4000
hexo server
# -p
```
## docker
### 
**cURL**

``` bash
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash -s docker --mirror Aliyun
```

# Hexo
## 
```
.
 _config.yml
 package.json
 scaffolds
 source
|    _drafts
|    _posts
 themes
```

- `_config.yml``Hexo`
- `themes`
- `source/_drafts`
- `source/_posts`

## 

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/configuration)

# 2. Docker

## Dockerfile

### hexo

- Hexo

``` dockerfile
FROM node:latest

MAINTAINER XwX

WORKDIR /hexo

RUN npm install hexo-cli -g\
&& hexo init .\
&& npm install

EXPOSE 4000

CMD ["/bin/bash"]
```

`docker build -t 'hexo'`

### blog

- 

``` dockerfile
FROM hexo:latest

MAINTAINER name <mail>

WORKDIR /hexo

EXPOSE 4000

CMD ["/usr/bin/env","hexo","server"]
```

- `docker build -t  'blog'  . `

## docker-compose.yml

- 

``` yaml
version: '3'
services:
  blog:
    restart: always
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    image: 'blog'
    container_name: hexo-blog
    ports:
      - "80:4000"
      volumes:
        - $HOME/.ssh:/root/.ssh
        - .:/hexo
```



- `docker-compose up -d`

- `docker-compose down`

# 

hexo

## Node.js
### [NodeSource](https://github.com/nodesource/distributions#debinstall)

``` bash
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
```
## Hexo
### npm

``` bash
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.1/install.sh | bash
```
### NodeHexo

``` bash
npm install hexo-cli -g
#
hexo init .
npm install

hexo server
```

# 2. Docker

## Dockerfile

### hexo

- Hexo

``` dockerfile
FROM node:latest

MAINTAINER XwX

WORKDIR /hexo

RUN npm install hexo-cli -g\
&& hexo init .\
&& npm install

EXPOSE 4000

CMD ["/bin/bash"]
```

`docker build -t 'hexo'`

### blog

- 

``` dockerfile
FROM hexo:latest

MAINTAINER name <mail>

WORKDIR /hexo

EXPOSE 4000

CMD ["/usr/bin/env","hexo","server"]
```

- `docker build -t  'blog'  . `

## docker-compose.yml

- 

``` yaml
version: '3'
services:
  blog:
    restart: always
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    image: 'blog'
    container_name: hexo-blog
    ports:
      - "80:4000"
      volumes:
        - $HOME/.ssh:/root/.ssh
        - .:/hexo
```



- `docker-compose up -d`

- `docker-compose down`
